name: Track Yaks
description:
A puzzle game prototype made with the prompts Underground and Hot

Move the Yaks to help the minecart along the track.

Click on objects to interact. R to restart level

Bugs: 

  • Second to last minecart in Level 4 needs to be moved forward an extra space
  • If the minecart is stuck at the end of a level you need to move a random yak to update the navmesh data so that the minecart can move.
  • Minecart navigation is broken on last level (use your imagination to solve the puzzle)
  • Interacting with yaks in the bottom of a stack causes other yaks to float
  • Yaks will phase into eachother and walls
